description: Removes tags for a resource in CodeCommit. For a list of valid resources in CodeCommit, see CodeCommit Resources and Operations in the CodeCommit User Guide.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource to which you want to remove tags.

parameters.name: tagKeys
parameters.description: The tag key for each tag that you want to remove from the resource. (string) ---
